title: Financial Management System
description: A robust, offline-first Desktop ERP and Financial Management System built for Janka Agency . This system streamlines financial tracking, inventory management, and business analytics.

title: CarGo
description: A modern car rental web application that allows users to browse, compare, and book rental cars online. Features include real-time availability, easy booking management, and a user-friendly interface.

title: AMH E-Commerce
description: I built AMH, a modern full-stack e-commerce platform for a clothing store as a hands-on learning project to strengthen my backend and full-stack development skills.

title: Smart Fitness Calorie Burn Predictor
description: I built a Machine Learning web application that predicts calorie burn during workouts!.This project was created for learning purposes and helped me explore: Training ML models (Random Forest), Flask web development , Data visualization with Chart.js , Modern UI/UX design and REST API developmentThe app has two modes:🔹 Predict Mode - Real-time calorie predictions🔹 Analyst Mode - Interactive dashboard with charts & statistics #MachineLearning #Python #Flask #DataScience #WebDevelopment #LearningJourney
